New York City faces significant challenges as winter storms lead to library closures, multiple fatalities among the homeless, and a deadly building explosion, while authorities investigate the impacts of extreme cold and prepare for ongoing severe weather conditions.

### Risks & Alerts

- Library closures across NYC due to winter storm; NYPL, Brooklyn, and Queens libraries are shuttered. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Three homeless individuals found dead on NYC streets amid extreme cold temperatures. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxNMmQ2SEwyQzBIdkFXMmFGbk1MQWROVXlQQ0ZoZGVGeW41MEhXQ01CWWhOM3R6Z0dTZnJnRjR6Qmp5NHlrbmpacTZvblI1V0tjcExPU3J6R3E1elJDNzNYRTRRWXNsb2gtNFlPS28yQ002dUx1SGg2Y01GRjR5SEk0V21uT3hjbU1yZGRtZ3N1aTNydUVKY0J3VzhZQnR1Qm9oRXZtbmU3V1dFSE0?oc=5)
- 1 killed and 15 injured in a building explosion and fire in NYC. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Six deaths being investigated for links to extreme cold temperatures in NYC. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMioAFBVV95cUxQWFJtT2hXcmFmblFOSEdEbWFyQnhlNHJFZFA1VGl6VWI3Y3o1aUF4SFJpRkhfQ3pzV28zUExUWXJUQUkzRzd2M19tT1BFRU81bTNFeS1Wb19sOG1kMnY1YUxXejF4blRlM2JYWnkwc3Jic1ZLM1dhZlpoT2dIOTZIUnZoVE8xNFBTdGVXZWFid2RfMXNIb1dXanNsakdScm42?oc=5)
- Coastal flood advisory in effect for Staten Island following heavy snow. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC bridges and tunnels, including a Staten Island crossing, will have lane closures in the coming days. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- NYC Nurses Strike: Union agrees to reach deal on maintaining health benefits. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- New York courthouses closed statewide Monday due to inclement weather. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinAFBVV95cUxNUU9xWXdGRXBDejE0V2hpUl9SeWl3NVZpbWlCTkZVcUFfMFpVakQwQkRZSTIyUUZVMkh5RExtQVQxWGJfSTRBV1NFV1ZONmN3N1dsT1I2VDNJR01BYVhKNEpZbmlHemJHQ1pSNU95QlJIWHEtcTVCZUF6MUlaS1A4YWh1dVpqRUpxNkhUX0c3QlJwX1VZbXNSRURwbEk?oc=5)

- Construction to Start on Chinatown Jail Despite Fierce Community Opposition. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihwFBVV95cUxQd3VZQUFOdWR0cDlRc0V6V2FZNC0wejhQb3I5bWFZaV9jWlJwM2h6RUdaVDlzVmF3Z3N6cjBibmN6Tzh6NHBDX2FjdEFIVUdiWWV6SUlvNHVqel9pMGhOb3hVWHZ2YngwN1o0eFM2VlNuemttV2FoeDVVRGNFY1R5YXpzT3dibWc?oc=5)

### Opportunities & Welfare

- Two Staten Island high schools will serve as warming centers during the storm. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- ELMO STUDIOS is hiring a Junior Architectural Designer in New York, NY. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimgFBVV95cUxQcVdMVlJfdUh2Z19rYkJJel9ia1kxNFlBd1JlX0N0Z3NyS2xWNHJ4X0p0YUpid0hYMlNVNEtNb05GeHdMOXhqYlJwbkRYUHpRd05OaFpiSXRrVkpfMmFmM3lfYzkzMUZUeTVxOWtJVm1kcnRheWhhRlBvSGs3dWNsU2NHZkFqUWdHUXRVVDE1RzM4OVJ5Sjg0N3d3?oc=5)
